price: Amaldiçoados. Onde quer que se acharem serão apanhados e mortos inexoravelmente.
arabic: مَّلۡعُونِينَۖ أَيۡنَمَا ثُقِفُوٓاْ أُخِذُواْ وَقُتِّلُواْ تَقۡتِيلٗا

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: malʿūnīna aynamā thuqifū ukhidhū waquttilū taqtīlan
